title: UK Water Leakage
publisher: Department for Environment Food & Rural Affairs
datasetNotes: No landing page for this dataset as it is a bespoke dataset supplied by CC team (source data from Defra) directly to IDP-D as part of the Climate Change Platform project. This is a UK wide version of the above Defra dataset E8: Efficient use of water which is England only data.
notes: Priority dataset for Climate Change Platform project.
